body:
Another lovely work by Sasakura sensei. 
Although I kinda miss the age difference tags
@Already_dead_18 You have an Eagle's Eye mate 👌🏿

poster.username: Forgive me for I have sinned

body: Can’t lie, it was pretty sly of that kid. The story was neato, also

@bgrgnawg790147 I think it goes like this: Megane wants Handsome Boi to fall in love with him, but he has this twisted idea of doing so: ordering others to "rape/abuse" him so that HB could be a "hero" and Megane would "fall in love" with him through his "heroic" acts. The shattered phone I think basically means he ain't gonna do those fake rapes anymore (though honestly, he could've just taken the damn SIM out lol, but I guess that wouldn't make as much of an impact to the story)
Is nobody gonna talk about the socks in p17?
Ok, i don't get it. Is the story just the faking bullying to get the other kid? Or something else? The shattered phone sorta through me off.
Uh- I- um- where’s the next chapter- I mean, peace out ✌️😶
